articles.description: The man who was given a restraining order for stalking Emma Raducanu has been blocked from applying for Wimbledon tickets.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: Stalker blocked from applying for Wimbledon tickets

articles.description: Former Premier League referee David Coote is charged by the Football Association over comments made about ex-Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp.
articles.title: David Coote: Ex-Premier League referee charged by FA over Jurgen Klopp comments

articles.description: Al-Hilal's chief executive Esteve Calzada says a possible loan move for Cristiano Ronaldo for the Club World Cup would have been "completely counter-intuitive".
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Al-Hilal loan move would have been 'completely counter-intuitive'

articles.description: Britain's Katie Boulter speaks exclusively to BBC Sport about the levels of social media abuse she receives.
articles.title: Katie Boulter: British tennis player reveals social media abuse she has received

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu and Spain's Carlos Alcaraz are among the pairings planning to play in the new-look US Open mixed doubles event.
articles.title: US Open 2025 mixed doubles: Emma Raducanu & Carlos Alcaraz sign up to new-look Grand Slam event

articles.description: Mercedes team principal Toto Wolff says Red Bull's protest against George Russell at the Canadian Grand Prix was "petty" and "embarrassing".
articles.title: Toto Wolff: Red Bull's protest 'petty' and 'embarrassing' against Mercedes' George Russell

articles.description: Tottenham are in regular contact with Israel winger Manor Solomon, who is stranded in his homeland because of the ongoing conflict with Iran.
articles.title: Manor Solomon: Tottenham in touch with stranded Israel winger

articles.description: South Africa legend AB de Villiers says there is "still work to be done" on the World Test Championship format despite the Proteas' unforgettable victory.
articles.title: World Test Championship: AB de Villiers says format needs to change despite South Africa win

articles.description: British number one Jack Draper makes comfortable progress to the last 16 at Queen's with a straight-set victory over American Jenson Brooksby.
articles.title: Queen's: Jack Draper beats Jenson Brooksby to reach last 16

articles.description: Jalen Williams scores 40 points for Oklahoma City Thunder as they hold off an Indiana Pacers comeback to win 120-109 and take a 3-2 lead in the NBA Finals.
articles.title: Jalen Williams stars as Oklahoma City Thunder move one win away from NBA title
